description: a giant military robot with lasers.
response:
If only I were built with hands instead of lasers...I might be
able to get out of this room.

Be careful in the testing hangar. They took Freight-500 out
there, and he's never come back. I saw one of the techs walk out
of here with his hard drive. He could probably use a new one...
You need a special key for the elevator.

I miss Robo-Bear. They said he was dangerous becuase he had
access to too much information about Auriga.
An encryption key is needed to access the air handling system here.
It feels cold in here... Wait, what am I saying? I'm a robot!
Ooohh, tell me about the master server!
name: KELT-2A
